mapper.insert: insert into feed set writer_user_id = #{writerUserId}, contents = #{contents}, location = #{location}
mapper.select: SELECT feed.feed_id AS feedId, contents, location, feed.created_at AS createdAt , writer_user_id AS writerUserId , if(user.nick_name IS NULL , uid, nick_name) AS writerNm , pic AS writerPic , IF(feed_like.feed_id IS NULL,0,1) as isLike , feed_like.* FROM feed INNER JOIN user ON feed.writer_user_id=user.user_id LEFT JOIN feed_like ON feed_like.feed_id=feed.feed_id AND feed_like.user_id=#{signedUserId} ORDER BY FEED.feed_id DESC LIMIT #{sIdx}, #{size}
